short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Covers your record (and elo, if desired) on the 6mans account and profile pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will cover up your record, leaderboard position, and past games history on your RL6Mans profile and account pages. You will need to set your username in extension options. Another option in the extension options allows you to decide if you want the extension to also block your elo or not. Clicking on the extension while on an rl6mans.com page will show a button. Green means that the extension is enabled, while red means the extension is disabled. Clicking the button will toggle the extension and reload the page.
